articles.description: A dangerous coronavirus variant is already wreaking havoc in other parts of the world and an expert says it's critical the US sticks with safety measures during the next few months to be able to beat another surge and keep people safe.
articles.title: A dangerous coronavirus variant is wreaking havoc in parts of Europe. Experts fear US could be next - CNN Philippines
